references.reason: This paper is foundational for understanding exchangeability, a crucial concept in nonparametric Bayesian models.

references.paper_title: Mixtures of Dirichlet Processes with Applications to Bayesian Nonparametric Problems
references.reason: This paper introduced the Dirichlet process mixture model (DPMM), a cornerstone of Bayesian nonparametric statistics.

references.paper_title: Bayesian density estimation and inference using mixtures
references.reason: This work provides key methods for Bayesian inference in mixture models, relevant to the DPMM used in this paper.

references.paper_title: Particle filters for mixture models with an unknown number of components
references.reason: This paper presents a particle filter for DPMMs, an approach compared to in this research.

references.paper_title: Markov Chain Sampling Methods for Dirichlet Process Mixture Models
references.reason: This paper offers a foundational MCMC method for DPMMs, a technique compared to the metalearning approach.
